course_description: This course emphasizes core issues in global health, explores the identification of global health priorities, the nature of global health organizations and the challenges to finding and implementing solutions. The focus changes with the instructor
prerequisites: ANT205 or HLTH250 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 7189, Section #: 9000, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: Staff, Status: Closed
